tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE environmental_areas (
   area_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   area_name VARCHAR(50),
   area_description TEXT,
   latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
   longitude DECIMAL(11, 8)
);

CREATE TABLE protected_species (
   species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   species_name VARCHAR(50),
   endangered_status BOOLEAN,
   habitat_type VARCHAR(50),
   area_id INT REFERENCES environmental_areas(area_id)
);

CREATE TABLE monitoring_data (
   data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   observation_date DATE,
   species_id INT REFERENCES protected_species(species_id),
   observer_name VARCHAR(50),
   number_observed INT
);

CREATE TABLE research_team (
   team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   team_name VARCHAR(50),
   team_lead VARCHAR(50),
   area_id INT REFERENCES environmental_areas(area_id),
   team_size INT
);

CREATE TABLE areas (
  area_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  area_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  latitude DECIMAL(9,6) NOT NULL,
  longitude DECIMAL(9,6) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE regions (
  region_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  region_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE countries (
  country_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  country_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE habitats (
  habitat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  habitat_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE species (
  species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)
